=======
CHANGES
=======


0.6.0 (2015-04-18)
------------------

- feature: changed kibana entry_point to forwarder. This allows us to setup
  the new kibana 4 server was bin/kibana and the forwareder server as
  bin/forwarder.


0.5.0 (2014-03-24)
------------------

- initial release
